name: Kingdra
description: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.effect: This Pokémon inflicts triple damage with critical hits, rather than the usual double damage.
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
